thumb.title: "Love's Pathos ~ 恋愛の哀れ" feat. MEIKO V3 & KAITO V3 (Prod. myss)
thumb.description: Song: "Love's Pathos ~ Ren'ai no Aware" (Prod. myss) Music/Composition/Instruments by: myss (myssbeats) Vocal data created by: Party-P Vocals: MEIKO V3 & KAITO V3 Lyrics, mixing, tuning & video by: Scarlett_Candela (紅明り) Art provided by: KaiNyan Stock footage provided by: SpaceCinema, Mitch Martinez, Rahul Sapra, Vittorio Cazzadore & Vichai Viriyathanaporn *All stock footage is being used under the "Free License" with attribution for Vecteezy.com *** "The sun has set once more beyond the horizon You and I will surely meet again in the next life" **** This original song was a part of the CFMemories concert with VOCALLECTION group. If you're interested in watching the concert, please follow this link for the day one show where you can watch/listen to this & other songs from my fellow VocaPs! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MMvoQf2ALwA****Twitter: @Scarlett_Cand3la Bluesky: scarlettcandela.bsky.social Piapro: piapro.jp/Kurenai_Akari Caard website: scarlett-candela.carrd.co Myss' Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKw5Oj5CyGj4XYOgAiivxhA
thumb.last_res_body: 888888888888888 調声すごいのでは 良い音 うぽつです
